content:
What if we have tooltip for + symbol in left sidebar just like we have in Relod and Setting
tooltip.png

And what if this icons of compose message, which are bottom of message are at top of message. With topic and stream name. Cause for that option we have to go to bottom of page and which also open Panel at bottom(in case of Auto hide panel).
composeMessage.png
@Yashashvi Dave Adding a tooltip for the + symbol would be a great little project. I think "Add organization" would be a good name.
